response.original_title: 劇場版 転生したらスライムだった件 紅蓮の絆編
response.overview: A long-running conspiracy is swirling over a mysterious power wielded by the Queen in Raja, a small country west of Tempest. When a slime who evolved into a Demon Lord named Rimuru Tempest crosses paths with Hiiro, a survivor of the Ogre race, an incredible adventure packed with new characters begins. The power of bonds will be put to the test!
response.tagline: The power of bonds will be put to the test!
response.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime the Movie: Scarlet Bond
